JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
		
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, name
			, ok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type = 'User'
		  AND name = 'Active'
	`
| sort time

| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats 
	by=[timegroup, usecase] 
	ok_count =AVG(ok_count )
| rename ok_count = activeUsers
| chart 
	by= [usecase]
	type = "line"
	x= timegroup
	y= activeUsers
	showaxes=true
	showlegend=false
	stacked=false
	pointradius=1

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	type_filter = "{}"
| global
	sparkheight="150px"
	sparkwidth="15vw"	
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, type
			, test
			, usecase
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p90
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
	`
###################################################
# Filter Type
###################################################
| filter 
	p(type_filter, "{}") == "{}" # show all when no filter
	OR contains(p(type_filter), type) == true

###################################################
# Set name and make Aggregate by Time
###################################################	
| set name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name
| crates 
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup, type, name] 
	"ok_count_sum"	=sumif("ok_count",  (contains("User,Gauge,System", type) != true) )
	"ok_count_avg"	=avg( if(contains("User,Gauge,System", type) == true, ok_count, null) ) 
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"avg"	=avg("ok_avg")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p90"	=perc("ok_p90", 90)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
	
###################################################
# Merge ok_count for charts
###################################################
| set
	ok_count = if( (ok_count_avg > 0)
					, ok_count_avg
					, ok_count_sum
				) # one will be zero
| move after=name ok_count
| remove ok_count_avg ok_count_sum

###################################################
# Make Stats table 
###################################################
| stats # now make statistics by request and create path for charts
	by=[type, name] 
	"ok_count_sum"	=sumif("ok_count",  (contains("User,Gauge,System", type) != true) )
	"ok_count_avg"	=avg( if(contains("User,Gauge,System", type) == true, ok_count, null) ) 
	"min"	=min("min")
	"avg"	=avg("avg")
	"max"	=max("max")
	"stdev"	=avg("stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("p75", 75)
	"p90"	=perc("ok_p90", 90)
	"p95"	=perc("p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("p99", 99)
	"counts" = records()
	"times" = records()

###################################################
# Merge ok_count for table
###################################################
| set
	ok_count = if( (ok_count_avg > 0)
					, ok_count_avg
					, ok_count_sum
				) # one will be zero
| move after=name ok_count
| remove ok_count_avg ok_count_sum

###################################################
# Format
###################################################
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '25vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name, counts, times)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]

| formatchart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["ok_count", "nok_count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type= "bar"
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	stacked = true
	showaxes=true
	showlegend = false
	pointradius=0
	colors = case( 
			  (type == "MessageError"), ["red"]
			  (type == "MessageWarn"), ["orange"]
			  (type == "MessageInfo"), ["cyan"]
			, (type == "Exception"), ["red"]
			, true, ["limegreen", "red"]
		)
| formatchart 
	fields=["times"] 
	by=[]
	y=["min", "avg", "p90", "max"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type="area"
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	showaxes=true
	showlegend = false
	pointradius=0

| sort usecase	
| display 
	as=table 
	sizes = [10, 25, 50, 100]
	defaultsize=25
	settings={stickyheader: true}

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"

	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  
	`

| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
| chart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["ok_count", "nok_count"]	
	colors = ["limegreen", "red"]
	x=timegroup 
	type= "bar"
	pointradius=0 
	showaxes = true
	showlegend = true
	stacked = true
	tension=0
	multichart=false

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	compare_to = "-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	
;
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################	
| meta testid = param('compare_to', '-1')

| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p90
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ meta('testid') +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
	`
| set name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[name] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"avg"	=avg("ok_avg")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p90"	=perc("ok_p90", 90)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)

;
###################################################
# Mimic Previous
###################################################	
| meta testid = param('test', '-1')
| mimic
; 
###################################################
# Compare Result
###################################################	
| resultcompare 
	by=[name]
	percentformat = [['percent', $threshold_good$, $threshold_bad$, "bg"]]
| nullto value=""
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '40vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name, counts, names)=['align', "right"]
	/*fieldsMatching("_%") = [
						['case'
							, '<=$threshold_good$', "cfw-green"
							, '>=$threshold_bad$', "cfw-red"
							, true, "cfw-gray"
						]
					]
	fieldsMatching("_%", avg, stdev)=['decimals', 1]*/
| display 
	as=table
	download=true
	print=true
	settings={stickyheader: true}
| resultremove "initialization"

JSON_SETTINGS.description: Compare the data selected with this time range picker (A), to the data shown above, selected with the dashboards time range picker (B). Preferably this time range you choose here should be earlier than the one selected for the dashboard. Thresholds are in percentages.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="n/a"
	database_id= -1
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type= "area"
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta name="data"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, name
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_p95
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
	`
;
#####################################
# MIN
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_min"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_min" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# AVG
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_avg"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_avg" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# P95
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_p95"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_p95" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# MAX
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_max"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_max" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;


#####################################
# Join
| meta name = "INDEX"
| source empty records = 100
| set PERC = count() + 1
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right" # join MIN
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join AVG
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join P95
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join MAX
| resultremove "data"
| rename PERC = Percentile
| chart 
	y=["ok_min", "ok_avg", "ok_p95", "ok_max"]	
	x=Percentile
	type="line"
	pointradius=2
	spangaps=true
	xtype=linear
	xlabel = "Percentile"
	ylabel = "Response Time"

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id)
	query= `
		SELECT *
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_testsettings
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
	`
| sort time reverse = true
| set 
	hue = (time / 1000) % 255
	time = timeformat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", time)
	endtime = timeformat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", endtime)
	settings = tojson(settings)
| unbox settings
| remove settings, testid, test
| formatcss fields=[time] style= "background-color: hsla("+hue+",66%,40%, 1.0);"
| remove execid, hue
| formatfield
	settings = list
| display 
	print = true
	download = true
	sticky= true

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
	
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, name
			, code
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  AND code != ''
		  
	`

| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| set count = ok_count + nok_count

| chart

	x=timegroup

###################################################

	type_filter = "{}"
	
###################################################

			, name

###################################################
# Filter Type
###################################################
| filter

	OR contains(p(type_filter), type) == true

###################################################
# Set name and make Stats
###################################################	
| set name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name

| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[type, name] 
	"ok_count_sum"	=sumif("ok_count",  (contains("User,Gauge,System", type) != true) )
	"ok_count_avg"	=avg( if(contains("User,Gauge,System", type) == true, ok_count, null) )

	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)

###################################################

###################################################

	ok_count = if( (ok_count_avg > 0)
					, ok_count_avg
					, ok_count_sum
				) # one will be zero

widgets.TITLE: Compared Boxplots
widgets.TITLE_INFO: MedianDiff colors are set by your threshold settings. Boxplot colors indicate closeness of median(white Line) to the high value(right side of box). The max value used in the box plots is 95th percentile to ignore extreme outliers.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	boxplot_relative = true
	compare_to = "-1"
;
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta 
	name = 'A'
	testid = param('test', '-1')
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p25
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ meta('testid') +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  AND ok_p99 > 0 -- only values with statistics
	`
| set name = if( path != "" , path +" > ", "") + name
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[name] 
	("ok_count_"+m(name))	=sum("ok_count")
	("nok_count_"+m(name))	=sum("nok_count")
	("min_"+m(name))		=min("ok_min")
	("mean_"+m(name))		=avg("ok_avg")
	("max_"+m(name))		=max("ok_max")
	("stdev_"+m(name))		=avg("ok_stdev")
	("p25_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p25", 25)
	("p50_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	("p75_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	("p95_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	("p99_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p99", 99)
;
###################################################
# Fetch Compare Data
###################################################
| meta 
	name = 'B'
	testid = param('compare_to', '-1')

| mimic
;
###################################################
# Join
###################################################
| resultjoin on=name
| sort name # sort by INDEX
| rename 
	name = name
	ok_count_A = Count_A
	ok_count_B = Count_B 
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot_A"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min_A"
	low 	 = "p25_A"
	median 	 = "p50_A"
	high 	 = "p75_A"
	max 	 = "p95_A"
	width 	 = "30vw"
| set
	MedianDiff = ("p50_B" / "p50_A") * 100 - 100 # between the two timeframes
	CountDiff = ("Count_B" / "Count_A") * 100 - 100 # between the two timeframes
	medianOffsetPerc = ("p50_B" - "p25_B") / ("p75_B" - "p25_B") * 100 # in the dashboard timeframe
	
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot_B"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min_B"
	low 	 = "p25_B"
	median 	 = "p50_B"
	high 	 = "p75_B"
	max 	 = "p95_B"
	width 	 = "30vw"
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)
| keep name, Count_A, Count_B, CountDiff, Boxplot_A, MedianDiff, Boxplot_B
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '30vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name, counts, names)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
	[CountDiff, MedianDiff] = ['percent', $threshold_good$, $threshold_bad$, "bg", ""]
| display 
	print = true
	sticky = true
| resultremove "initialization"

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
		
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta
	name = "Number of Active Users by usecase"
	title = true
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, name
			, ok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type = 'User'
		  AND name = 'Active'
	`
| sort time
| rename ok_count = activeUsers
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup, usecase] activeUsers=AVG(activeUsers)
| chart 
	by=["usecase"] 
	type = param(chart_type)
	x= timegroup
	y= activeUsers
	showaxes=true
	showlegend=true
	stacked=true
	pointradius=1
	multichart = true

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	boxplot_relative = true
	

###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta
	name = "Boxplots by Name"
	description = "Shows boxplot statistics and charts by name. 
				First boxplot column displays a regular boxplot. 
				Second boxplot column displays the boxplots relative to all other boxplots.
				Boxplot is colored by the position of the median (white line) inside of the box.
				The closer it is to the right side, the more red it turns."
	title = true
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p25
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  AND ok_max > 0
	`
| set name = if( path != "" , path +" > ", "") + name
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[name] 
	"count"		=sum("ok_count")
	"min"		=min("ok_min")
	"avg"		=avg("ok_avg")
	"max"		=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"		=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p25" 		=perc("ok_p25", 25)
	"p50"		=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"		=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"		=perc("ok_p95", 95)
| set
	range = max - min
	IQR = "p75" - "p25"
	medianOffsetPerc = ("p50" - "p25") / ("p75" - "p25") * 100 
	
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "10vw"
	relative = false
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)

| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot Relative"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "20vw"
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)

| sort name
| remove medianOffsetPerc 
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '30vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
| display 
	download = true
	print = true
	sticky = true
| resultremove "initialization"

	"p75"		=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"		=perc("ok_p95", 95)
| set
	range = max - min
	IQR = "p75" - "p25"
	medianOffsetPerc = ("p50" - "p25") / ("p75" - "p25") * 100 
	
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "10vw"
	relative = false
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)

| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot Relative"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "20vw"
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)
	
| sort name
| remove medianOffsetPerc 
| formatfield
	usecase=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '30vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, usecase)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
| display 
	download = true
	print = true
	sticky = true
| resultremove "initialization"

###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta
	name = "Number of Started Users by usecase"
	title = true
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, name
			, ok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats

	`
| sort time
| rename ok_count = startedUsers
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats

	startedUsers=AVG(startedUsers)

	type = param(chart_type)
	x= timegroup
	y= startedUsers
	showaxes=true
	showlegend=true
	stacked=true
	pointradius=1
	multichart = true

###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  
	`
| set name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
;
###################################################
# Doughnut Requests Total OK vs NOK
###################################################
| meta
	name = "Requests Total OK vs NOK"
	description = "Overall Requests OK vs NOK count, not grouped by request or usecase."
	title = true
	titleduration = false
	multipercent = 30
| resultcopy name = "fetchData"
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup] 
	"ok_count"	= sum("ok_count")
	"nok_count"	= sum("nok_count")

| chart 
	y=["ok_count", "nok_count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type= "doughnut"
	height = "400px"
	showaxes = true
	showlegend = true
	legendpos=bottom
	colors = ["limegreen", "red"]

	description = "Status Codes by usecase over time as stacked bar charts."
	title = true
	titleduration = false
	multipercent = 100
| resultcopy name = "fetchData"
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup, usecase, name, code] 
	"count"	= sum("count")
| chart 
	by= [usecase, code]
	y=["count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type= "bar"
	stacked = true
	height = "300px"
	pointradius=1
	showaxes = true
	showlegend = true
	tension=0
	multichart=true
	multichartby=[usecase]
	multichartcolumns=3

###################################################
# Remove Data
###################################################
| resultremove "fetchData"

widgets.TITLE: Compare Test Settings
widgets.TITLE_INFO: Shows all settings from all the tests compared between the two timeframes.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test= -1
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	compare_to = -1

###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta testid = param('test', '-1')
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id)
	query= `
		SELECT *
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_testsettings
		WHERE testid = `+ meta('testid') +`
	`
| sort time reverse = true
| remove testid, execid
| set 
	duration = endtime - time
	settings = tojson(settings)
| unbox settings
| remove settings, endtime
| display menu=button sticky = true

;
###################################################
# Mimic Previous
###################################################	
| meta testid = param('compare_to', '-1')
| mimic
;

###################################################
# Compare Result
###################################################	
| resultcompare
	by=[usecase]
	percentformat = [['percent', $threshold_good$, $threshold_bad$, "bg", "cfw-gray"], [align, center]]
| nullto value=""
| formatfield
	request=[
			  ['css', "max-width", "20vw"]
			 ,['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
			 ,['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		]
			
	fieldsMatching("time_A", "time_B")=['timestamp', "yyyy-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"]
	fieldsMatching("duration_(A|B|Diff)")=['duration']
| remove 
	"test_%" "time_Diff" "time_%" "executor_%"
| move after="pacing_%" fieldsMatching("time_")
| display 
	as=table
	download=true
	settings={stickyheader: true}
| resultremove "initialization"

widgets.TITLE: SLA
widgets.TITLE_INFO: SLA(avg) is calculated based on an average of the datapoints. The "SLA" column will contain the overall SLA after a test has finished and was not aborted.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
	type_filter = "{}"
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
			, ok_avg
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p90
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
			, failrate
			, ok_sla
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
			AND ok_sla >= 0
	`

###################################################
# Filter Type
###################################################
| off filter 
	p(type_filter, "{}") == "{}" # show all when no filter
	OR contains(p(type_filter), type) == true

###################################################
# Format SLA
###################################################	
| formatrecord
	[(ok_sla == 1), "green"] 
	[true, "red"] 


###################################################
# Make Stats
###################################################	

| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[path, name] 
	"ok_count_sum"	=sumif("ok_count",  (contains("User,Gauge,System", type) != true) )
	"ok_count_avg"	=avg( if(contains("User,Gauge,System", type) == true, ok_count, null) ) 
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
	"avg"	=avg("ok_avg")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p90"	=perc("ok_p90", 90)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
	"SLA Over Time" = records()
	"SLA(avg)"	=avg("ok_sla")

###################################################
# Adjust values
###################################################
| set
	ok_count = if( (ok_count_avg > 0)
					, ok_count_avg
					, ok_count_sum
				) # one will be zero
	failrate = nok_count / (ok_count + nok_count) * 100
| rename failrate = "Fails[%]"
| move after=name ok_count
| move after="p99" "Fails[%]"

| remove ok_count_avg ok_count_sum

###################################################
# Handle SLA
###################################################	
| set
	"SLA Rule" = subquery(`
		| source postgres 
		environment=param(database_id) 
		query= "
			SELECT 
				sla
			FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_tests
			WHERE id = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		"
		
		| set rule = tojson(sla).'`+name+`'
		| dedup rule
		| keep rule
		`)
	
	"SLA" = subquery(`
		| source postgres 
		environment=param(database_id) 
		query= "
			SELECT 
				ok_sla
			FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats_summary
			WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
				AND ok_sla >= 0
				AND path = '`+path+`'
				AND name = '`+name+`'
		"
		`)
	
	"SLA"	= case(
				("SLA" == 1), "OK", 
				("SLA" == 0), "NOK", 
				true, "" # do not show if not available
			)
	"SLA(avg)"	= if(("SLA(avg)" > 0.5), "OK", "NOK")
	
| move after="Fails[%]" "SLA Rule"
| formatfield
	["Fails[%]"] = [ 
		['case', ">0", "cfw-red"]
		, [decimals, 1]
		, [postfix, " %"]
	]
	
	["SLA", "SLA(avg)"] = ['case'
			, "==OK", "cfw-green"
			, "==NOK", "cfw-red"
	]
###################################################
# Format
###################################################
| set 
	name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name
| remove path
| nullto value=""
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '30vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
| formatdisplay
	fields=["SLA Over Time"]
	as=statusbar
	height ="25px"
	width = "15vw"
| display
	as=table
	titlefields = [usecase, name]
	titleformat = "{0} / {1}"
	download = true
	store = true
	print = true
	settings={stickyheader: true}

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id)
	query= `
		SELECT 
			sla
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_tests
		WHERE id = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
	`
| set
	sla =  tojson(sla)
| unbox sla
| unbox sla
| remove sla

| display 
	as = table
	print = true
	download = true
	sticky = true
	settings = {verticalize = true }

widgets.TITLE_INFO: Request Count by Status Codes. Code '000' stand for unknown status code, for example on connection error.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	boxplot_relative = true
	

###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta
	name = "Boxplots by Name"
	description = "Shows boxplot statistics and charts by name. 
				First boxplot column displays a regular boxplot. 
				Second boxplot column displays the boxplots relative to all other boxplots.
				Boxplot is colored by the position of the median (white line) inside of the box.
				The closer it is to the right side, the more red it turns."
	title = true
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, type
			, test
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p25
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  AND ok_max > 0
	`
	
###################################################
# Filter Type
###################################################
| filter 
	p(type_filter, "{}") == "{}" # show all when no filter
	OR contains(p(type_filter), type) == true
	
###################################################
# Set Name make Stats
###################################################
| set name = if( path != "" , path +" > ", "") + name
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[name] 
	"count"		=sum("ok_count")
	"min"		=min("ok_min")
	"avg"		=avg("ok_avg")
	"max"		=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"		=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p25" 		=perc("ok_p25", 25)
	"p50"		=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"		=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"		=perc("ok_p95", 95)
| set
	range = max - min
	IQR = "p75" - "p25"
	medianOffsetPerc = ("p50" - "p25") / ("p75" - "p25") * 100 
	
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "10vw"
	relative = false
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)

| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot Relative"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "20vw"
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)

| sort name
| remove medianOffsetPerc 
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '30vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
| display 
	download = true
	print = true
	sticky = true
| resultremove "initialization"

widgets.TITLE: Failures
widgets.TITLE_INFO: SLA(avg) is calculated based on an average of the datapoints. The "SLA" column will contain the overall SLA after a test has finished and was not aborted.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
	type_filter = "{}"
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, path
			, name
			, code
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
			, ok_avg
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p90
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
			, failrate
			, ok_sla
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
			AND failrate >= 0
	`

###################################################
# Filter Type
###################################################
| off filter 
	p(type_filter, "{}") == "{}" # show all when no filter
	OR contains(p(type_filter), type) == true

###################################################
# Format SLA
###################################################	
| formatrecord
	[(ok_sla == 1), "green"] 
	[true, "red"] 


###################################################
# Make Stats
###################################################	

| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[path, name, code] 
	"ok_count_sum"	=sumif("ok_count",  (contains("User,Gauge,System", type) != true) )
	"ok_count_avg"	=avg( if(contains("User,Gauge,System", type) == true, ok_count, null) ) 
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
	"avg"	=avg("ok_avg")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p90"	=perc("ok_p90", 90)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
	"Failure Over Time"	= records()
	"SLA(avg)"	=avg(if("ok_sla" == null, 2, "ok_sla")) #handle undefined SLA

###################################################
# Adjust values
###################################################
| set
	ok_count = if( (ok_count_avg > 0)
					, ok_count_avg
					, ok_count_sum
				) # one will be zero
	failrate = nok_count / (ok_count + nok_count) * 100
| filter failrate > 0
| rename failrate = "Fails[%]"
| move after=name ok_count
| move after="p99" "Fails[%]"

| remove ok_count_avg ok_count_sum

###################################################
# Handle SLA
###################################################	
| set
	
	"SLA" = subquery(`
		| source postgres 
		environment=param(database_id) 
		query= "
			SELECT 
				ok_sla
			FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats_summary
			WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
				AND ok_sla >= 0
				AND path = '`+path+`'
				AND name = '`+name+`'
		"
		`)
	
	"SLA"	= case(
				("SLA" == 1), "OK", 
				("SLA" == 0), "NOK", 
				true, "" # do not show if not available
			) 
	"SLA(avg)"	= case(
				( "SLA(avg)" > 1), "",   # handle undefined SLA
				("SLA(avg)" >= 0.5), "OK", 
				("SLA(avg)" < 0.5), "NOK", 
				true, "" # do not show if not available
			)
	
| formatfield
	["Fails[%]"] = [ 
		['case', ">0", "cfw-red"]
		, [decimals, 1]
		, [postfix, " %"]
	]
	
	["SLA", "SLA(avg)"] = ['case'
			, "==OK", "cfw-green"
			, "==NOK", "cfw-red"
	]
###################################################
# Format
###################################################
| set 
	name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name
| remove path
| nullto value=""
| formatchart 
	fields = ["Failure Over Time"]
	type = sparkbar
	x=time
	y="failrate"
	height="150px"
	width="250px"
	colors=["cfw-red"]
	
	
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '30vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
| display
	as=table
	titlefields = [usecase, name]
	titleformat = "{0} / {1}"
	download = true
	store = true
	print = true
	settings={stickyheader: true}

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: test
parameters.DESCRIPTION: The timeframe you want to analyze. Either select one of the tests listed or select "Use Timeframe Picker" to select a custom timeframe with the picker above.
parameters.VALUE:
| paramdefaults
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
| source postgres 
	environment=p(database_id)
	query= `
		SELECT *
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_tests
	`
| sort time reverse = true
| dedup time, name
| top 3000 
| set 
	latestTime = if(endtime != null, endtime, timeoffset(time, 1, 'h') )
	value = id 
	label = timeformat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", time, true) 
			+ " to " 
			+ if( endtime != null
				, timeformat("HH:mm", latestTime, true) 
				, "??:??" 
				)
			+ " [" +name +"]"
| keep value label

;
| resultconcat

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: compare_to
parameters.VALUE:
| paramdefaults
	database_id=-1

| sort time reverse = true

			+ " to " 
			+ if( endtime != null
				, timeformat("HH:mm", latestTime, true) 
				, "??:??" 
				)
			+ " [" +name +"]"
| keep value label

;
| resultconcat
